CustomField.formula: IF(CloseDate - Product_1__r.IP_Availability_Date__c < 0, CloseDate - Product_1__r.IP_Availability_Date__c , IF(CloseDate - Product_2__r.IP_Availability_Date__c < 0, CloseDate - Product_2__r.IP_Availability_Date__c , IF(CloseDate - Product_3__r.IP_Availability_Date__c < 0, CloseDate - Product_3__r.IP_Availability_Date__c , 0)))
CustomField.label: ES vs. Production date
